com.opera.core.systems.testing.drivers

Interface TestDriverSupplier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTestDriverSupplier, TestOperaDesktopDriverSupplier, TestOperaDriverSupplier, TestOperaMobileDriverSupplier

    public interface TestDriverSupplier
    A driver supplier allows easy construction of differently configured OperaDriver's. TestDriverSupplier extends Supplier interface to make it possible to specify settings on a supplier and query programmatically whether it supplies a driver of the given type.
    See Also:
    TestDriverBuilder

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OperaSettings getSettings()
      Gets the settings used for this supplier.
      void setSettings(OperaSettings settings)
      Changes the settings for this supplier.
      boolean supplies(Class<? extends TestDriver> klass)
      Does this supplier supply a driver of the given class?

        Changes the settings for this supplier.
        Parameters:

      • supplies

        boolean supplies(Class<? extends TestDriver> klass)
        Does this supplier supply a driver of the given class?
        Parameters:
        klass - class to to check if this supplier supplies
        Returns:
        true if supplier supplies klass, false otherwise
